mapper.select: SELECT gnh.ftrCode ,gnh.hospitalId ,gnh.patientId ,gnh.ftName ,gnh.ftCode ,gnh.ftrValue ,gnh.pDoctor ,gnh.ftdTime ,gnh.adminId ,gnh.ftrDate ,pit.pName FROM ginuengh gnh JOIN patient pit ON gnh.hospitalId = pit.hospitalId AND gnh.patientId = pit.patientId WHERE gnh.hospitalId = #{session.SID}
SELECT ftrCode , hospitalId , patientId , ftName , ftCode , ftrValue , pDoctor , ftdTime , adminId , ftrDate FROM ginuengh where patientId = #{patientId}
mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO ginueng SELECT ftrCode , hospitalId , patientId , ftName , ftCode , ftrValue , pDoctor , ftdTime , adminId , ftrDate FROM ginuengh WHERE patientId = #{patientId}
mapper.select: SELECT gn.ftrCode ,gn.hospitalId ,gn.patientId ,gn.ftName ,gn.ftCode ,gn.ftrValue ,gn.pDoctor ,gn.ftdTime ,gn.adminId ,gn.ftrDate ,pit.pName FROM ginueng gn JOIN patient pit ON gn.hospitalId = pit.hospitalId AND gn.patientId = pit.patientId
